title: What Neighborhoods have the most Young People?
text:
Hey guys. I am moving to DC in July with a job working for the government. I want to know what neighborhoods in DC are mostly young millennials (Age 20-35)? I read a lot about DC being filled with young people who are creative and love travelling. Here are the factors I am using to choose a neighborhood:

​

\-Concentration of young people

\-Food options (Fast casual >>> fancy restaurants)

\-Vibrant nightlife close by

\-Good Date spots 

\-Density

\-Access to Public Transportation

​

I am likely going to live with roommates so quality renting options will be a factor too.
